#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,r;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    int count=0,temp=0;
    unsigned long long i=1,j;
    cin>>n>>r;
    int m=n;
    int c=n-r;
    if(c<0)
    printf("1\n");
    else
    {    
     if(c>r)
     c=r;
     j=1;
     while(j<=c)
     {
     i=(i*n)/j;
  //   cout<<i<<"\n";
     j++;
     n--;
     }
      printf("%llu\n",i);      
      }
      }
      return 0;
      }
